text: Jerry Doyle (July 16, 1956 – July 27, 2016) was an American talk radio host, right-libertarian political commentator and television actor. He was the founder of the content platform EpicTimes. His nationally syndicated talk show, The Jerry Doyle Show, aired throughout the United States on Talk Radio Network. As an actor, Doyle is known for his role as Michael Garibaldi in the science fiction series Babylon 5 (1994–1998). == Other websites == * * Category:1956 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:American political commentators Category:American radio personalities Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Libertarians Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Jerry Doyle
